intro: Notobasis, commonly known as the spider orchid, is a genus of flowering plants in the orchid family, Orchidaceae. It is native to Australia and is characterized by its unique, spider-like appearance due to its long, slender petals and sepals. The plant typically grows in rocky or sandy soils and thrives in arid or semi-arid environments. Notobasis species are known for their delicate, fragrant flowers that bloom in spring and summer. These plants are often found in coastal regions and are adapted to withstand harsh environmental conditions.
